title: Speech Data Builder: TTS & STT Dataset Creation Tool

content.value: Speech Data Builder is a powerful, open-source web application designed to streamline the creation of professional speech datasets for Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Speech-to-Text (STT) model training. It runs entirely in the browser with no server-side processing, ensuring data privacy.
Main Interface (Light Mode) showing the waveform and transcription tools.

Main Interface (Dark Mode). The tool features AI-powered transcription (integrating Google Gemini and OpenAI), precise audio visualization using WaveSurfer.js, and automatic text normalization. Users can export datasets in popular formats like LJSpeech, CSV, and JSON.

shortDescription: A browser-based tool for creating high-quality TTS/STT datasets with AI transcription and audio visualization.
metaDescription: Create professional speech datasets for TTS and STT models with Speech Data Builder. Features AI transcription, WaveSurfer visualization, and LJSpeech export. Free and open-source.
objectives: Create a privacy-focused, client-side tool for speech dataset creation.
Integrate AI services (Google Gemini, OpenAI) to speed up transcription.
Provide precise audio visualization and region selection.
Support industry-standard export formats like LJSpeech.

functionality.description: Automatically transcribe audio using Google Gemini or OpenAI Whisper models.
Visualizes audio waveforms with region selection for accurate timestamping.
Automatically normalizes text (numbers to words, special characters) for TTS training.
Exports data to LJSpeech, CSV, JSON, and TXT formats.
Installable as a Progressive Web App (PWA) that works offline.

design.aesthetic: Clean and functional interface with both Light and Dark modes to reduce eye strain during long annotation sessions.
design.responsiveness: Fully responsive design, installable as a PWA on various devices.
design.accessibility: Includes keyboard shortcuts for playback and annotation to improve workflow efficiency.

outcomes: Developed a robust tool that simplifies the complex process of creating speech datasets.
Enabled users to generate training data for TTS/STT models without needing a backend server.
Successfully integrated modern AI APIs for automated transcription.

challenges.challenge: Handling large audio files and datasets purely in the browser.
challenges.solution: Utilized IndexedDB for efficient client-side storage and JSZip for generating large export files without crashing the browser.

challenges.challenge: Visualizing audio data accurately for precise splitting.
challenges.solution: Implemented WaveSurfer.js to render detailed waveforms and allow precise region manipulation.
